title: Sun Transit in the 1st House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits the 1st house for Sagittarius Ascendant, vitality, confidence, and self-expression rise sharply. This phase enhances leadership presence, clarity of purpose, and the desire to act independently. Personal goals come into focus, and others notice your authority and conviction. Health and energy generally improve, though ego clashes are possible if confidence turns rigid. When balanced with humility, this transit supports strong self-belief, decisive action, and a renewed sense of direction.
closing: This Sun transit empowers identity and leadership. With humility, it becomes a powerful phase for confident beginnings and personal authority.
